messages.content:
==================================================
[CONTEXT]
  Timestamp: 2026-02-12T09:15:00+08:00
  Sender Role: Site Supervisor
  Project Phase: Defect Liability Period
  4D Task Status: TASK_999: General Inspection - ACTIVE

[CHAT HISTORY]
  Site Supervisor: Found some hairline cracks on this surface.
  Site Supervisor: See attached photo.

[USER QUERY]
  Check this crack.

[ATTACHED IMAGES]
  Image path: /root/cmu/master_thesis/mscd_demo/data/ground_truth/gt_1/imgs/img_gt_001_1.png
  Note: Use analyze_site_image(image_path) to analyze these images
==================================================

I can't analyze the image right now, but I can try to match the description "hairline cracks on this surface" to elements in the model. What kind of surface is it (e.g., wall, slab, ceiling)? Knowing this will help me narrow down the search.

==================================================
[CONTEXT]
  Timestamp: 2026-02-10T14:00:00+08:00
  Sender Role: Facade Specialist
  Project Phase: Module Installation
  4D Task Status: TASK_505: Module Installation 6 - Sixth Floor - ACTIVE

[CHAT HISTORY]
  Facade Specialist: I am on the gondola outside. The sealant looks loose here.

[USER QUERY]
  Is the sealant leaking here?
==================================================

I cannot directly determine if the sealant is leaking from the BIM model. However, I found 3 windows on the 6th floor where the sealant might be located:

*   BALANS Fixed Single Window:BALANS TRAPPHUS TOP:959331 (GUID: 0Um_J2ClP45uPRcRbJqhxe)
*   BALANS Fixed Single Window:BALANS 10M BATHROOM:959731 (GUID: 0Um_J2ClP45uPRcRbJqhbu)
*   BALANS Fixed Single Window:BALANS 10M BATHROOM:960189 (GUID: 0Um_J2ClP45uPRcRbJqhis)

Would you like me to get the detailed properties of any of these windows? This might provide information about their sealing or water resistance. Alternatively, if you have a photo of the sealant, I can analyze it to help identify the specific element and assess the situation.

==================================================
[CONTEXT]
  Timestamp: 2026-02-10T11:00:00+08:00
  Sender Role: Main Con Supervisor
  Project Phase: Handover
  4D Task Status: TASK_045: Ground Level Cladding - COMPLETED

[CHAT HISTORY]
  Main Con Supervisor: The park-facing unit has a gap.

[USER QUERY]
  Check the window joint defect.
==================================================
I can help check for window joint defects. However, I need more information to narrow down the search. Could you please specify which floor or room the park-facing unit is on?

args.description: window joint defect in the park-facing unit with a gap
